subject: Woodforest National Bank.
body:
Woodforest National Bank.
762 banking locations.
corporate headquarters
1330 Lake Robbins Drive in The Woodlands Texas
PAYMENT US$6.5 million UNITED STATES DOLLARS FOR YOU,URGENT RESPONSE
THIS EMAIL
Good morning. I am very surprise for your continue silent after my last email to you.
I take you as a honest man but you have med me to
understand that you are not serious as i think,therefore i will treat you the way that i treat people who are not serious because i will divert your funds to government office since you are playing with my intelligent.
i made oath that if i lie to you,let God take my life. And i was only fearing GOD but you have offended me now,and i will make you cry this time since you do not deserve all the respect am giving you, I promise to help you with sum of $50.00 which i do, but till today you never thank me for one day for the help i made to you.
Therefore please,
if that you still interested to receive your package,i advise you to get back to me immediately with $25,­00 Apple
Gift Card or Steam Wallet Card because is only money that you have to spend until you will receive your package tomorrow if you can try and send the $25.00 Apple Gift Card or Steam Wallet Card in time today
.then I can assure you 100% that you will never regret this after sending this $25,00 today because am very sure that you will receive your funds immediately after sending the $25.­00 Apple Gift Card or Steam Wallet Card today,and that is why am begging you to try because I will not like you to lose now that we are almost done. I am waiting for your response of a $25.00 Apple Gift Card or Steam Wallet Card.
Yours sincerely,
Robert E. Marling Jr.
Email;forestnbankwood@aol.com
Chairman, Chief Executive Officer,
Chief Executive Officer of Woodforest National Bank And Director of
Woodforest National Bank

subject: Re: Woodforest National Bank.
body:
Good morning! Thank you for sharing this information about Woodforest National Bank and the corporate location in The Woodlands, Texas. I appreciate your message.

Could you tell me more about the services offered at Woodforest National Bank? I'm interested in learning about their banking locations and what sets them apart from other banks.

Also, I'm curious to know how the payment of US million dollars is related to the response you mentioned in your email. Is there a specific reason for requesting an Apple Gift Card or Steam Wallet Card for this transaction?

Looking forward to hearing more details from you.

Best wishes,
Lorie
